background:url(https://s3.amazonaws.com/scschoolfiles/1857/img_hss_081811_umj3gq.png); background-position: center center; background-size:cover; background-repeat: no-repeat;
background:url(https://s3.amazonaws.com/scschoolfiles/1857/img_hss_141859_cqfxsm.png); background-position: center center; background-size:cover; background-repeat: no-repeat;

div.p: On behalf of the entire CPS BOE I'd like to give a ROUSING CHEER to our amazing students, teachers, staff, adm and community. I am so honored to represent you as a member of the CPS Board of Education, together we are making our district stronger and growing the Fightin' Chick pride everyday. I ran my campaign on change and believe we are making changes to better our district and increasingly better FOR our students. The CPS comeback is already happening, regardless of COVID-19 and I assure you, it won't keep the Purple & Gold from reaching the "brass ring"! Here are a few details of the incredible week for those lucky enough to wear our beloved PURPLE & GOLD!

p.b: A round of applause goes to these award winners:

p.img: Yvonne Kennedy: Region 5 Swim Coach of the Year
Brandon Willis: CPS District Teacher of the Year
We are singing the praises of our Grammy Winning CHILD NUTRITION TEAM! Cheers to them as they continue to serve over 1000 meals EVERY day! Just WOW!

Let's stand up, clap, wave and give a" rousing cheer" for our Fightin' Chick, CPS TEACHERS! Have you noticed their ability to jump through hoops, spring into action, transition into new formations, dance through challenges, pivot, spin, bob, weave AND still smile for the camera to deliver the GOLD? AMAZING! Our teacher's creativity, determination, compassion, commitment and daily grace are reaching beyond the classroom and setting a marvelous example of handling life's challenges!! The job our teachers are now being called to do is something you would never expect and it's certainly NOT what you prepare for, yet they are in the groove. Mic Drop!

Giving crazy accolades to our entire district ADMINISTRATION as they've stepped up as ringmasters and have been jumping through hoops, juggling balls, balancing spinning plates...and sometimes even tame roaring lions!. And they still keep things running on schedule during this crazy circus!! Special "Thank You" to Mr. Croslin, CPS is blessed.

We cannot leave out the 'heavy lifters' of the CPS STAFF. Your swift ability to carry a heavy load, help keep things on track, communicate and step up to whatever the task is at hand, is vital. You further ensure the students needs are met as an important support to our district. WE thank you for the important job you do!

Grab your megaphone and give a "shout out" to the CPS FAMILIES and COMMUNITY!! We are lifting you up and cannot imagine what you're dealing with. Each family has their own circumstances and we recognize that. We admire your perseverance through this uncharted course of online lessons, tasks and projects for your student(s). Please know we are always available for conversations and communication with you, we are striving to empower you too. Please reach out and ask questions, share input or just to talk with us. The CPS website is packed with valuable information and contact information. We deeply care about you and will forever remain your cheerleaders too!

The big DRUMROLL and 1st PLACE AWARD goes to the CPS STUDENTS!!! Their amazing feats of adaptability and a willingness to work with their teachers, while also having to undergo unimaginable and unprecedented changes takes character and fortitude. They are worthy of a GOLD MEDAL, a STATE CHAMPIONSHIP and a place in the CPS HALL OF FAME!! WE ARE PROUD OF ALL CPS STUDENTS!

A special note to our Seniors: We are so very proud of you and acknowledge the bounty of hard work you have put into your last 12 years of school and developing yourself. It does NOT go unnoticed and we are not giving up on 'some type' of recognition and giving you YOUR moment to shine as a Fightin' Chick at CPS!!! Keep those caps and gowns dusted off...stay tuned! #foreverachick #chicksfight #weareproudofyou #senior2020

div.p: In closing, we SALUTE ALL OF OUR DISTRICT TEAM! We are joined together in a magnificent way during this time and we will always remember the changes, challenges and overcoming them SPRING 2020. Remember life throws us curve balls sometimes, let's continue to work together, encourage each other, reach higher and keep knocking it out of the ballpark for CPS.
We thank you and are so grateful for each of you.
Chickasha Public Schools Board of Education

Chickasha High School is still planning on having graduation for the Class of 2020. Due to recent events it will not be held on May 15, 2020 as originally planned. At this time, we cannot tell you exactly when, where, how, what, etc. about graduation. We are brainstorming ideas. Please know, we are committed to having a graduation ceremony of some fashion that will be memorable and special for this graduating class. They have earned this event and we want it to happen for them. So, stay tuned!
